product_overview: Krenke NextGen 2026 is a modern, high-performance institutional website reimagining for Krenke Brinquedos, Brazil's leading playground and leisure equipment manufacturer since 1987. It aims to reflect the brand's quality, safety, and technological innovation through a premium digital experience.
core_goals: Establish brand authority with a modern and premium design.
Facilitate product and category discovery across playgrounds, pet lines, and furniture.
Optimize conversion via a simplified quote request flow.
Provide a robust admin dashboard for managing products, blog content, leads, and configurations.
key_features: Smart product catalog with category filtering and detailed technical specifications.
Intuitive lead generation quote cart allowing multiple product selections and contact submission.
Showcase gallery of real installation projects for social validation.
News and blog section with articles on leisure, safety, and company updates.
Easy access to technical downloads like manuals and catalogs in PDF format.
Admin product management with full CRUD and image uploads to Supabase Storage.
Lead management dashboard to monitor quote requests.
Rich Text blogging editor with cover image handling.
User access control with roles (Super Admin and Restricted Access).
Third-party script injection management interface for tags like Google Tag Manager and Facebook Pixel.
user_flow_summary: Visitor lands on the Home page featuring video hero and highlights.
User browses Products catalog with filtering and views product specs.
Users can add products to a quote request cart via the Quote form.
Quote lead information is submitted and saved, triggering notifications.
Admin logs in via the Authentication system and accesses the Admin dashboard.
Admin manages product catalog, uploads images, edits blog and monitors leads.
Resellers access exclusive resources via the Reseller Area after login.
Site implements global layout components like header, footer, and cookie consent dialog.
validation_criteria: Page load time under 2 seconds on stable 4G networks using preloaders and WebP image optimization.
Secure admin routes with strong authentication via JWT/Supabase tokens.
Responsive design across mobile, tablet, and desktop with consistent breakpoints.
Dynamic SEO meta tags and semantic HTML structure for higher search rankings.
Leads saved correctly in the database with notification triggers via Webhooks or edge functions.
